    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81288</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Faille</string>
            <string language="en">Fault</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Störung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Falha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Difetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βλάβη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Incidente</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la faille de San Andreas aux Etats-Unis. Une ligne de faille est la marge entre deux plats qui se déplacent l'un après l'autre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the San Andreas fault in the United States. A fault line is the margin between two plates that move past each other.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plats</string>
            <string language="en">plates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">faille de San Andreas</string>
            <string language="en">San Andreas fault</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Etats-Unis</string>
            <string language="en">United States</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die San Andreas Störung in
den Vereinigten Staaten. Eine Störung Zeile ist der Seitenrand 
zwischen zwei Platten, die an einander vorbeibewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a falha do San Andreas 
nos estados unidos. Uma linha da falha é a margem entre duas 
placas que se movem após se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che il difetto di San
Andreas in unito Dichiara. Una riga del difetto è il 
margine fra due piastre che si muovono oltre a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει βλάβη SAN Ανδρέας στις
Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες. Μια γραμμή βλαβών είναι το περιθώριο 
μεταξύ δύο πιάτων που κινούνται το ένα μετά από το άλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el incidente del San 
Andreas en los Estados Unidos. Una línea del incidente es el 
margen entre dos placas que pasen uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">San Andreas Störung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinigte Staaten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">placas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Falha do San Andreas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estados Unidos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piastre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Difetto di San Andreas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito Dichiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιάτα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βλάβη SAN Ανδρέας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Incidente del San Andreas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estados Unidos</string>
